Editing the Classics
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Writers Workshop (Writer's General Q & A): Editing the Classics
By torey luvullo on Wednesday, November 14, 2001 - 05:15 am:

i just added the final chapter of elements to the completed epic list. while i was there, i noticed that each chapter of the most popular epics ended with some crosstalk - mostly "attaboy"; "what took you so long"; etc. would it be objectionable for me to edit these out?

By CHB on Sunday, November 18, 2001 - 12:25 pm:

Leave the complements. Its encouraging not only for the authors of the stories, but for others to have a bit of inspiration, something to look forward to.
